history.content: The course staff, once that gets announced (see @3555).

That's the third week? Seems a bit early; the first midterm is usually in the fourth week (or at least, has been in the last few weeks).

Anyway, you should indeed double-check this with the course staff, once that gets announced (see @3555).

When the hiring process for instructors is complete and summer instructors are listed publicly on the schedule of classes, you should contact the instructor and ask them directly. It is completely at the instructor's discretion.

Hi,

I am currently enrolled and intend to take CS70 in the summer. However, I will need to miss one week of classes to represent Cal at an engineering competition during the 4th of July week. As far as I am aware, that week is the week of the first midterm too. Is there anyone I can approach to clarify course policy about missing this midterm and confirm if the course is willing to accommodate my absence as it is an official reason for absence.

Thanks!
history.subject: Schedule conflict with Summer 2017 CS70
